preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 500 g of Bismuth (Bi), 100 g of Chromium (Cr), 100 g of Phosphorus (P), 200 g of Lead (Pb), and 1600 g of Titanium (Ti) using a precision scale. 
 2. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine the powdered ingredients using a spatula to ensure homogeneity. 
 3. Use a mortar and pestle to grind the mixture further for better uniformity if needed.
